ai-tha-ap118:1.2_0: It’s current, with birth and death.
ai-tha-ap118:1.3_0: When the Fortunate One became fully extinguished,
ai-tha-ap118:2.3_0: and after plunging there in the water,
ai-tha-ap118:4.3_0: Through that deed and its result,
ai-tha-ap118:5.1_0: now I’ve attained the state of loss.
ai-tha-ap118:5.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
ai-tha-ap118:6.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap118:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap118:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṇḍolabhāradvāja.
ai-tha-ap118:10.1_0: The sixth section on the label ‘mersion’ when the Elder Nuns had been given the sixth section.
